pr_title: Remove minimum deposit amount restriction from validator subcommands

timeline.message: Remove minimum deposit amount restriction from validator deposit and register subcommands.

timeline.bodyText: Is this how you specify a default?
timeline.author: cemozerr

replies.bodyText: Yes, though I've just realised it was deliberately set to not have a default and be required.  That seems reasonable since the deposit amount varies on custom networks so much so I've gone back to that.
replies.author: ajsutton
